problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, \frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{N_0}{N_1}, if the area of △ADE is N_2, then the area of quadrilateral DBCE is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵\frac{AD}{DB}=\frac{AE}{EC}=\frac{1}{2},∴DE∥BC,∴△ADE∽△ABC,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupADE}}{S\bigtriangleupABC}={(\frac{AD}{AB})}²=\frac{1}{9},∵△ABC的面积为9,∴△ADE的面积是1,∴四边形DBCE的面积是9-1=8,故选:D．
